Package OOP_Project.application.controller

Class memory

  • java.lang.Object
    • OOP_Project.application.controller.memory
  • public class memory
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Bedetta Alessandro

    CLASS which represents the real working center of the program. It has all the necessary methods which respond to the requests made by the user. It also acts as memory, indeed, each time a listReview request is made, all the reviews are stored in a vector; later on they will be processed by the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      memory()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String getDailyRevs​(java.lang.String date, java.lang.String file)
      Once the user specifies a date and a file name, the method returns the list of reviews made on the specified file on that day.
      static java.lang.String getStats​(java.lang.String file)
      Once the user specified a file name, the Method shows statistics made on the file, regarding the time lapses between all the requests made on it.
      static java.lang.String listReview​(java.lang.String file)
      Method needed to send the listReviews request and store all the data in the 'reviews' vector.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • memory

        public memory()

    • Method Detail

      • listReview

        public static java.lang.String listReview​(java.lang.String file)
        Method needed to send the listReviews request and store all the data in the 'reviews' vector. if the operation goes well, the 'reviews' vector is filled up, otherwise an error is returned.
        Parameters:
        file - The file we are working with.
        Returns:
        A String representing a JSONArray containing all the reviews made on that file.

      • getStats

        public static java.lang.String getStats​(java.lang.String file)
        Once the user specified a file name, the Method shows statistics made on the file, regarding the time lapses between all the requests made on it. At the beginning the 'listReview' method is called and so the 'reviews' vector is updated The method relies on 'dateFormatHandler' class to handle the date format. The method also relies on 'statResponce' class to combine all the statistics in a single JSONObject.
        Parameters:
        file - That file which has been specified
        Returns:
        A String representing a JSONObject containing all the statistics.
        See Also:
        OOP_Project.application.models.statResponce

      • getDailyRevs

        public static java.lang.String getDailyRevs​(java.lang.String date,
                                            java.lang.String file)
        Once the user specifies a date and a file name, the method returns the list of reviews made on the specified file on that day. At the beginning the 'listReview' method is called and so the 'reviews' vector is updated The method also checks the validity of the date using the 'dateFormatHandler' class
        Parameters:
        date - The specified date
        file - The specified file
        Returns:
        A String representing a JSONArray containing all the reviews the haven't been filtered.
        See Also:
        dateFormatHandler
